org.smooks.delivery.memento

Interface VisitorMemento

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractVisitorMemento, SaxNgSerializerVisitor.StartElementMemento, TextAccumulatorMemento, WriterInterceptor.WriterMemento

    public interface VisitorMemento
    Holds the state of a Visitor. A VisitorMemento is saved and restored it at a later stage. A VisitorMemento is bound to a Visitor and its visitable (e.g., NodeVisitable). Management of VisitorMementos should be delegated to MementoCaretaker.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VisitorMemento copy()
      Performs a deep clone of this VisitorMemento.
      String getId()
      Gets the ID of this VisitorMemento.
      Visitable getVisitable() 
      Visitor getVisitor() 
      void restore(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
      Combines a VisitorMemento state with this VisitorMemento

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        VisitorMemento copy()
        Performs a deep clone of this VisitorMemento.
        Returns:
        a deep clone of this VisitorMemento

      • restore

        void restore(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
        Combines a VisitorMemento state with this VisitorMemento
        Parameters:
        visitorMemento - the VisitorMemento restoring this VisitorMemento

      • getVisitor

        Visitor getVisitor()
        Returns:
        the Visitor which this VisitorMemento is bound to

      • getVisitable

        Visitable getVisitable()
        Returns:
        the visitable which this VisitorMemento is bound to

      • getId

        String getId()
        Gets the ID of this VisitorMemento. VisitorMementos with equal IDs are considered to be capturing the state of the same object but at different points in time.
        Returns:
        the ID of this VisitorMemento
